nodes.text: A male Gungan was the Security Chief during the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY, and was responsible for security concerns in Gungan society. At the Battle of the Sacred Place and just before the Battle of Naboo, the Security Chief participated in a short duel with Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi. He employed boomas and an electropole in battle, and also ordered militiagungs to attack. The Jedi defeated him and were allowed access to Boss Rugor Nass.
The Gungan Security Chief appears in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles.
